title: hara hariyena
sahitya:
hara hariyena kharaharapriyA ADip-pADuga nADiyAzhilE


anupallavi

  nara jIvanum amara jIva nadiyAgi sadgati sEravE


caraNam    shara sharavena pala vinaigaLin sankaTangaL tIra
shAntamAna sama nilaiyilE sahaja niSTai sEra
para shiva cidambara veLiyilE paravasha uyir paravai ulava
